author: Joe Scott
description:
Be the first to see my new documentary feature Oldest and Newest Places On Earth on Nebula December 12th! Sign up at http://www.nebula.tv/joescott and get 50% off your annual subscription.

The South Pole has been permanently inhabited for 68 years, thanks to the Amundsen-Scott South Pole Station, which has been the home of groundbreaking science and a unique culture that can’t be found anywhere else on Earth.

Want to support the channel? Here's how:

Spotify 👉 https://spoti.fi/37i
title: What It’s Like To Live At The South Pole
